DOC.brief_summary: Participants study receive 3 single oral dos LY2835219 least 14 day apart . One dose give standard meal , one dose high-fat meal one dose without food . The study evaluate effect standard high-fat meal much drug get bloodstream . Side effect document . This study approximately 43 day , include screen . Screening require within 28 day prior start study .
DOC.criteria: Healthy sterile male surgically sterile postmenopausal female Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive , screen Are able eat highfat , highcalorie meal Participated clinical trial involve investigational product within 30 day Abnormal blood pressure Have abnormality 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , opinion investigator , increase risk associate participate study Have donate blood 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last month Show evidence human immunodeficiency virus , hepatitis B hepatitis C
